rules_text:
Reborn 2–{2}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
When Nevendell Duelist becomes reborn, you may have it fight target creature.
notes:
2k17
Cost: GG > G
Outlast 1GG > Reborn 2—2GG
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on Nevendell Duelist, you may have it fight target creature you don’t control. > 
When Nevendell Duelist becomes reborn, you may have it fight target creature.
